alert.note: Alert for Beaver (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 04 at 5:38AM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Beaver, northwestern Lipscomb and southeastern Ochiltree Counties through 615 AM CDT... At 538 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 6 miles north of Wolf Creek Park, or 12 miles southeast of Perryton, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lipscomb, Booker, and Wolf Creek Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
